text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Scientology defector arrested after attempting to leave organization
text.summary: On September 29, 2010, after leaving Scientology's elite Sea Org group and going to Florida to meet former scientologist Tom Devocht, 19 year old Daniel Montalvo was arrested in Los Angeles on charges of grand theft for allegedly taking Scientology hard drives and a zip drive when he defected.
